title: I would like to apologize for being toxic
body: can you make a button that mutes myself from the team? I cant stand when I lose lane the team ping spams mia on my dead body. it makes me flame/tilt.  Ik its my fault for being toxic BUT IM SORRY RIOT . i dont expect to be forgiven, but i just want to know if you'll consider the mute myself button{{champion:32}} {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: I would like to apologize for not being toxic enough in game and for not truly expressing my disdain for my teammates.

You can actually disable the chat from the options menu! Just do a little poking around and I'm sure you will find it!

Hope this helps!
